ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] lute question
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, I d get one just to do that. Draelon ... From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@den.invesco.com] Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 11:30 AM To:
ygData.messageBody:
Cool,

I'd get one just to do that.

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 14, 2000 11:30 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] lute question


That's odd, I equip mine all the time. It does not act as a stringed
instrument though. You can equip it with a weapon which really makes some
older bards who don't know the secret jump. Nothing like having a 40th
level bard begging you to tell how you managed to have an instrument and a
weapon equipped at once and where you got this lute they never heard of.

Kitasi

I tried this recently, but Lisera (from Cassius at the Bard Guild in Qeynos)
is not equippable.
-KS
